import math

n=int(input())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
segs=[]
st=-1
for i in range(n):
	iso=False if i==0 or i==n-1 else a[i-1]==a[i+1] and a[i]!=a[i-1]
	if iso and st==-1:
		st=i
	elif not iso and st!=-1:
		segs.append((st,i-1))
		st=-1
ans=0
for l,r in segs:
	span=r-l+1
	ans=max(ans,span)
	for i in range(span//2):
		a[l+i]=a[l-1]
		a[r-i]=a[r+1]
	if span%2:
		j=l+span//2
		a[j]=sorted([a[j-1],a[j],a[j+1]])[1]
print(math.ceil(ans/2))
print(*a)
